SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.jcatapult.mvc.action.result.annotation
Annotation Type Stream

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Stream

This annotation marks a result from an action as a Streaming result using an InputStream from the action.

Author:
Brian Pontarelli

Optional Element Summary
 String code
           
 String length
           
 String name
           
 String property
           
 String type
           
 

code

public abstract String code
Returns:
The result code from the action's execute method that this Result is associated with.
Default:
"success"

type

public abstract String type
Returns:
The content type of the InputStream. This is used to set the HTTP header and disposition so that the browser can correctly handle the response. This defaults to ${type}, which means that its value is set dynamically using the value from the type property of the action.
Default:
"${type}"

name

public abstract String name
Returns:
The file name sent back to the client. This is used to set the content disposition header so that the browser displays the correct name when saving the response to a file. This defaults to ${name}, which means that its value is set dynamically using the value from the name property of the action.
Default:
"${name}"

length

public abstract String length
Returns:
The content length sent back to the client. This is used to set the content length header so that the browser displays a progress bar when downloading the file. This defaults to ${length}, which means that its value is set dynamically using the value from the length property of the action.
Default:
"${length}"

property

public abstract String property
Returns:
The name of the property of the action that returns an InputStream. The bytes from this InputStream are sent back to the browser via the ServletOutputStream. This defaults to stream, which means the getStream method of the action should return the InputStream.
Default:
"stream"
